components.html: *All fields marked with an asterisk are mandatory.

components.label: Civic Address or Location
components.description: If no civic address, include nearest roadway

components.label: Type(s) of utility affected (e.g. sewer, telephone, electrical)
Are likely or actual high risk conditions present (associated with the likely or actual migration of substances from the source parcel)?

components.html:
Attention:

A sketch plan showing the extent of actual or likely contaminant migration must be included with submission of this form.
components.label: Text/Images
I understand a sketch plan must be included with submission of this form.
Likely or actual migration of substances from the source parcel was identified during:

components.html: In the case of independent remediation, a notice of independent remediation is required to be submitted under section 54 (2) of the Environmental Management Act on initiation and completion of the remediation.

Civic Address or Location

components.title: Section 3 - Source Parcel Property Owner and/or Operator

components.html:
Attention:

A site plan and Land Title record must be included with submission of this form.
components.label: Text/Images
I understand that a site plan and Land Title record must be included with submission of this form.

components.title: Section 5 - Confirmed or Suspected Source of Contamination (e.g. leaking underground storage tank)

components.html: List the substances which have migrated or likely have migrated to one or more neighbouring parcels and are or are likely causing contamination at the neighbouring parcel(s). Provide the information for each environmental medium (soil, groundwater and surface water, sediment, and vapour).
components.label: Static Text

components.html: I confirm that the above information is true based on my knowledge as of the date this notification form was completed.
